Spinster Sisters Co. Clay Mask

Brand: Spinster Sisters Co.

Category: Mask

Ingredients: BENTONITE CLAY, MOROCCAN LAVA (RHASSOUL) CLAY, KAOLIN CLAY, ACTIVATED CHARCOAL, COLLOIDAL OATMEAL, AND ANDEMLALEUCA ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA TREE) LEAF OIL.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental
